titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd before the Right Honourable Lord Mayor and Aldermen, and citizens of London, at St. Lawrence Jewry, on Saturday, September the 28th, 1700 at the election of the Lord Mayor, for the year ensuing / by Samvel Bradford ...
titleStmt.author: Bradford, Samuel, 1652-1731.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
